item.title: Report X-2025050282
item.description:
Report X-2025050282

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-02T15:18:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-17
  • City: MIDWAY
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO OF DELAWARE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SUPERVISOR WAS DOING A PRE SORT INSPECTION FOR LOCAL SORT AND NOTICED 4 PACKAGES ON THE ROLLERS WITH TNT MARKINGS ON THE SIDE OF EACH PACKAGE. SET THEM ASIDE, AND INFORMED AN AUDITOR AND RESPONDER TO CALL THE HAZMAT HOTLINE TO SEE IF WE COULD SHIP THE PACKAGES. THE ADUDITOR/RESPONDER WAS GIVEN INSTRUCTION BY THE HAZMAT HOTLINE TO HOLD THE PACKAGES. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS: 1Z35E5950393450070, 1Z35E5950391479080 AND 1Z35E5950390683306

item.title: Report X-2025050193
item.description:
Report X-2025050193

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-01T01:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-01
  • City: NORTH LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ABF stated forklift operator Lucas Wooten was unloading freight from trailer 501646 when the blades were too long and went through the pallet on the other end and punctured the bottom of the tote that was behind the pallet causing an active spill. ABF stated there are no waterways or drains effecte d.
